00024 ColumnMoveCommand::ColumnMoveCommand(DiagramColumnLayout* layout,
00025                                      DiagramColumn* column,
00026                                      QPointF const& oldPos,
00027                                      QUndoCommand* parent) : QUndoCommand(parent),
00028                                                              layout_(layout), column_(column),
00029                                                              oldPos_(oldPos), newPos_(column->pos())

00040 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00041 // Function: undo()
00042 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00043 void ColumnMoveCommand::undo()
00044 {
00045     column_->setPos(oldPos_);
00046     layout_->onMoveColumn(column_);
00047     layout_->onReleaseColumn(column_);
00048 
00049     // Execute child commands.
00050     QUndoCommand::undo();
00051 }
00052 
00053 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00054 // Function: redo()
00055 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00056 void ColumnMoveCommand::redo()
00057 {
00058     column_->setPos(newPos_);
00059     layout_->onMoveColumn(column_);
00060     layout_->onReleaseColumn(column_);
00061 
00062     // Execute child commands.
00063     QUndoCommand::redo();
00064 }

00082 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00083 // Function: undo()
00084 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00085 void ItemMoveCommand::undo()
00086 {
00087     DiagramColumn* oldColumn = static_cast<DiagramColumn*>(item_->parentItem());
00088 
00089     item_->setPos(oldColumn->mapFromScene(oldPos_));
00090     oldColumn->onMoveItem(item_, oldColumn);
00091 
00092     DiagramColumn* newColumn = static_cast<DiagramColumn*>(item_->parentItem());
00093     newColumn->onReleaseItem(item_);
00094 
00095     // Execute child commands.
00096     QUndoCommand::undo();
00097 }
00098 
00099 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00100 // Function: redo()
00101 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00102 void ItemMoveCommand::redo()
00103 {
00104     DiagramColumn* oldColumn = static_cast<DiagramColumn*>(item_->parentItem());
00105 
00106     item_->setPos(oldColumn->mapFromScene(newPos_));
00107     oldColumn->onMoveItem(item_, oldColumn);
00108 
00109     DiagramColumn* newColumn = static_cast<DiagramColumn*>(item_->parentItem());
00110     newColumn->onReleaseItem(item_);
00111 
00112     // Execute child commands.
00113     QUndoCommand::redo();
00114 }

00138 {

00140 }
00141
